sentences: Valentina Nikolaevna Levko (Russian: Валенти́на Никола́евна Левко́; 13 August 1926 – 14 August 2018) was a Russian opera and chamber singer (contralto, mezzo-soprano), teacher, professor.
She was a soloist of the Bolshoi Theater of USSR from 1960 to 1982.
In 1969, she was awarded the People's Artist of the RSFSR.
